arrangements.desc: Whether you visit our hotel for a wonderfully relaxing weekend, as a follow-up to your business meeting or during one of our events At De Bonte Wever you will immediately feel at home! What makes

arrangements.name: Sunday Special
arrangements.desc: Enjoy your Sunday in peace and quiet with this beautiful arrangement! Upon arrival you can immediately use the hotel room and enjoy a delicious brunch buffet. Enjoy to the fullest

arrangements.name: Midweek All-inclusive – Drents Museum
arrangements.desc: The Drents Museum presents the major archeology exhibition Dacia – Empire of Gold and Silver. More than fifty gold and silver treasures from Romania from the 20th century BC to the 3rd century AD come to Assen.

moment.desc: No request is too small, and no aspect is overlooked. Because we know that when every detail counts, memories are made to last a lifetime.
